00041 /*
00042  *  The constants below define the lengths of each field contained in
00043  *  the security info in any header for a NITF file
00044  *
00045  */
00046 
00047 /*
00048  * These are the constant lengths for the 2.1 FileSecurity fields
00049  */
00050 #define NITF_CLSY_SZ   2
00051 #define NITF_CODE_SZ   11
00052 #define NITF_CTLH_SZ   2
00053 #define NITF_REL_SZ    20
00054 #define NITF_DCTP_SZ   2
00055 #define NITF_DCDT_SZ   8
00056 #define NITF_DCXM_SZ   4
00057 #define NITF_DG_SZ     1
00058 #define NITF_DGDT_SZ   8
00059 #define NITF_CLTX_SZ   43
00060 #define NITF_CATP_SZ   1
00061 #define NITF_CAUT_SZ   40
00062 #define NITF_CRSN_SZ   1
00063 #define NITF_RDT_SZ    8
00064 #define NITF_CTLN_SZ   15
00065 
00066 /*
00067  * The total block size for a 2.1 FileSecurity section
00068  */
00069 #define NITF_SG_BLOCK_SZ \
00070     NITF_CLSY_SZ + \
00071     NITF_CODE_SZ + \
00072     NITF_CTLH_SZ + \
00073     NITF_REL_SZ  + \
00074     NITF_DCTP_SZ + \
00075     NITF_DCDT_SZ + \
00076     NITF_DCXM_SZ + \
00077     NITF_DG_SZ   + \
00078     NITF_DGDT_SZ + \
00079     NITF_CLTX_SZ + \
00080     NITF_CATP_SZ + \
00081     NITF_CAUT_SZ + \
00082     NITF_CRSN_SZ + \
00083     NITF_RDT_SZ  + \
00084     NITF_CTLN_SZ
00085 
00086 /*
00087  * These are the constant lengths for the 2.0 FileSecurity fields
00088  * Notice that there are less fields in 2.0 than in 2.1...
00089  */
00090 #define NITF_CODE_20_SZ   40
00091 #define NITF_CTLH_20_SZ   40
00092 #define NITF_REL_20_SZ    40
00093 #define NITF_CAUT_20_SZ   20
00094 #define NITF_CTLN_20_SZ   20
00095 #define NITF_DGDT_20_SZ   6
00096 #define NITF_CLTX_20_SZ   40
00097 
00098 
00099 /*
00100  *  It is suitable to refer to the object field either by its meaningful
00101  *  name, or by its specification name.  The short (spec) names are just
00102  *  aliases to the full names.  They also help us internally to perform
00103  *  macros which require that the length field can be algorithmically
00104  *  constructed using the form {SHORTNAME}##SZ
00105  *
00106  */
00107 
00108 #define NITF_CLSY classificationSystem
00109 #define NITF_CODE codewords
00110 #define NITF_CTLH controlAndHandling
00111 #define NITF_REL  releasingInstructions
00112 #define NITF_DCTP declassificationType
00113 #define NITF_DCDT declassificationDate
00114 #define NITF_DCXM declassificationExemption
00115 #define NITF_DG   downgrade
00116 #define NITF_DGDT downgradeDateTime
00117 #define NITF_CLTX classificationText
00118 #define NITF_CATP classificationAuthorityType
00119 #define NITF_CAUT classificationAuthority
00120 #define NITF_CRSN classificationReason
00121 #define NITF_RDT  securitySourceDate
00122 #define NITF_CTLN securityControlNumber
00123
